utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, so I just came in today uh a bit concerned. Uh I've been just having this nasty cough for like the last week and then today morning uh, like I thought the cough would just go away, but today morning I also noticed I'm coughing up some blood.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: So when did you first start coughing?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um, so let me think uh I just returned from a mission trip uh to the Philippines 2 weeks ago. This cough started uh just last week, so I would say around six to seven days.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. And that and the blood in your cough, um that was about yesterday, you said? Or?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Today, OK. OK. Um are you bringing up any phlegm at all, besides the blood?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh no it's just uh like I saw it on my hand, like there wasn't anything, like my cough is like pretty dry.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, are you short of breath at all?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I'm not short of breath. Um just, it's just the cough.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, and are you having any wheeziness?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um any runny nose or stuffy nose?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, no uh runny or stuffy nose.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Changes in vision, hearing, smell, or taste?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um I have noticed uh weight loss over the last uh, I would say few months. So I've been I've been doing like like I I came back from Philippines last week, but um, I had gone earlier, like during this year or two and I've kind of noticed this weight change, probably lost around 15 pounds within the last few months.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: 15 pounds OK. Wow, that's a lot, yeah. Um any night sweats?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um no, I don't think so, no.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: I did have a, I did have some chills over the last week, um but I didn't really think too much of it.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, we'll take your temperature today just to make sure. Um any rashes?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Um, changes in your bowel movements?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, are you otherwise healthy? Do you have any longstanding medical conditions?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah no, I'm otherwise I um I don't, I'm really healthy. I don't take any medications so this was something that happened out of the blue.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, any um hospitalizations or surgeries in the past?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: No, um medications, are you on any?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I haven't um tried any medications.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um are you up to date with all your immunizations?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uh I I've been yeah, pretty up to date with all my immunizations.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, uh, allergies, do you have any?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Sorry, forgot to ask, immunizations. Did you get the flu shot this year?

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, good. Any family history of lung conditions?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No, I have never smoked a day in my life.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: No I would never take drugs.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. Um where do you live right now?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: So I I just live in a small apartment by myself, uh just been moving around a lot.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK, for sure. Um any like asbestos, mold, or like old carpets, dust, anything like that at your apartment?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Um not uh, I don't think so like we um, maybe in the Philippines, we do provide a, so I go on like these mission trips with the Church and um we do sometimes go to the hospital as well.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Sometimes yeah, we we do see some sick people.

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: But other than that, not since I've been here, no.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Any travel outside the Philippines recently?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Uhm, so I think. So this year has just been the Philippines, before I used to go to India as well. Um but recently nothing outside of the Philippines.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: OK. OK, um those were all the questions that I had for you. Do you have any questions for me?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, I I was very worried um uh about the blood. I was just reading some things up and uh, about tuberculosis, so I was really stressed out today.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Yeah so um, that's definitely high on our differential. So, we'll do a couple of things. We'll do a Covid swab on you um just to rule that in or out, you should hear back for, about those results, in 24 to 48 hours. While you're here in the hospital, we're also going to do a chest X-Ray and or like an AFB smear to see if you have active TB or latent TB. If those come back positive um we will require you to isolate because this uh, because TB is highly infectious and it's airborne. Um so we have a couple of uh, we have like a regimen that we'd put you on. It's called the RIPE medications that we keep you on for two months and then we continue a couple of those for another four months. Um but we will uh keep you here until we have more answers on um like from this TB standpoint. How does that sound?

utterances.speaker: patient
utterances.text: Yeah, that sounds good. Um yeah I'm really worried, but hopefully it's not TB.

utterances.speaker: doctor
utterances.text: Yeah, hopefully it's not, um but if it is, it's it's OK, like um we'll get infectious disease involved. Uh we'll get the isolation going and we'll get you on the correct treatment.
